contentrichtext.text: '''John Snow''' or '''Jon Snow''' may refer to: ==People== * [[John Snow (MP)]] (16th century), English MP for Tregony 1593 and Yarmouth (Isle of Wight) 1597 * [[Jon Snow]] (born 1947), British newscaster * [[John Snow (cricketer)]] (born 1941), English cricketer * [[John Snow (physician)]] (1813â€“1858), English founder of epidemiology and a major contributor to the development of anaesthesia * [[John J. Snow, Jr.]], American politician, member of the North Carolina State Senate * [[John W. Snow]] (born 1939), American politician, 73rd United States Secretary of the Treasury ==Fictional characters== * [[Jon Snow (A Song of Ice and Fire)|Jon Snow (''A Song of Ice and Fire'')]], a character from the novel series ''A Song of Ice and Fire'' ==Other== * [[John Snow, Inc]], public health research/consulting firm ==See also== * [[Jack Snow (disambiguation)]] {{hndis|Snow, John}} [[nl:John Snow]]
